metadata.title: CVE-2021-41737 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In Faust 2.23.1, an input file with the lines "// r visualisation tCst" and"//process = +: L: abM-^Q;" and "process =route(3333333333333333333,2,1,2,3,1) : *;" leads to stack consumption.

criterions.comment: faust package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
